footer.tagline: The digital real estate management revolution.

hero.badge: The real estate revolution is underway
hero.description: CIEL AVENUE revolutionizes real estate management with a digital platform that connects buyers, sellers, developers and experts. Find your ideal property with ease.

vision.title: Our vision
vision.description: Transform the real estate experience by offering a transparent, efficient and human-centered platform. We put technology at the service of your life projects.

card1.title: Total transparency
card1.description: Clear and verified information at every step of your real estate journey.

card2.title: Speed of execution
card2.description: An optimized process that significantly reduces traditional delays.

card3.title: Human expertise
card3.description: Qualified experts personally support you in your project.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.description: Simplify and modernize access to property ownership in France. We believe that every real estate project deserves personalized attention and cutting-edge digital tools.
mission.imageAlt: CIEL AVENUE - Your real estate partner

value.title: Why CIEL AVENUE?
value.description: A unique approach that combines cutting-edge technology and human expertise to revolutionize your real estate experience.

cta.title: Ready to revolutionize your real estate project?
cta.description: Join thousands of users who have already trusted CIEL AVENUE to make their real estate projects a reality.

hero.title: Contact us
hero.description: Have a question, a real estate project, or just want to learn more? Our team is here to help you.

hero.title: About
hero.description: We are revolutionizing real estate in France with a digital platform that connects all market players.

vision.title: Reinventing the real estate experience
vision.description1: CIEL AVENUE was born from a simple observation: traditional real estate is too complex, too slow, and lacks transparency. We have created a platform that simplifies every step of the buying journey while ensuring expert and personalized support.
vision.description2: Our vision is to become the reference for digital real estate in France, combining cutting-edge technology and human expertise to offer the best possible experience to our users.

mission.title: Democratizing access to property
mission.description: Our mission is to make access to property simpler, faster and more transparent for everyone. We believe that every real estate project deserves personalized attention and high-performance digital tools.

step1.title: Simplify the buyer journey
step1.description: A guided and optimized process at every step

step2.title: Connect stakeholders
step2.description: Buyers, sellers, developers and experts on the same platform

step3.title: Ensure transparency
step3.description: Clear and verified information throughout the journey

values.title: Our values
values.description: The principles that guide each of our actions and decisions.

human.title: Human
human.description: Technology at the service of humans, never the other way around

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in every detail

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly innovate to better serve

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: Transparency and honesty in all circumstances

team.title: Our team
team.description: A passionate and experienced team, dedicated to transforming real estate.

cta.title: Have a question? Contact us
cta.description: Our team is at your disposal to answer all your questions.

hero.title: How does it work?
hero.description: A 3-module journey designed to simplify your real estate project and connect you to the best opportunities.

module1.title: Define your criteria
module1.description: An intelligent decision tree that guides you step by step to precisely define your real estate needs.

feature1.title: Property type
feature1.description: Apartment, house, land - define your ideal project

feature2.title: Location
feature2.description: Geographic areas, proximity to services and transport

feature3.title: Budget and characteristics
feature3.description: Surface area, number of rooms, desired amenities

demo.question1: What type of property are you looking for?

module2.title: Legal situation and documents
module2.description: Secure collection of your administrative documents to create a complete and compliant file.

feature1.title: Secure documents
feature1.description: Your information is protected and encrypted

feature2.title: Personalized list
feature2.description: Only the necessary documents are requested

module3.title: Solvency score
module3.description: An accurate assessment of your borrowing capacity carried out in partnership with our banking partners.

feature1.title: Financial analysis
feature1.description: Complete study of your financial situation

feature2.title: Banking partners
feature2.description: Access to the best financing conditions

feature3.title: Instant result
feature3.description: Your pre-qualified profile in a few minutes

cta.title: Start your journey now
cta.description: A simple and guided process to realize your real estate project with peace of mind.

journey.title: Customer journey
journey.description: Complete the 3 modules to create your buyer profile

module1.title: Define your criteria
module1.description: Tell us about your ideal real estate project
module1.question1: What type of property are you looking for?

module2.title: Legal situation and documents
module2.documentsDescription: Select the documents you can provide now

module3.title: Solvency score
module3.analysisDescription: Our banking partners are evaluating your profile

evaluation3.title: Banking history
evaluation3.description: Management of your accounts and credits

module3.noteText: This assessment is carried out in partnership with our partner banking institutions. Your data is processed confidentially and securely.
